name: Your Turn to Disembark
description:
Notice: Base game only includes Chapter 1 of the game, more chapters will be added in later updates.

You've awakened inside of a train with no memory of ever boarding...

Something appears to be weird about this train.
Maybe it's the surprisingly clean environment, maybe it's the windows that are just a bit too hard to see out of.

Or maybe it's the fact that the train appears to be never ending, constantly looping back on itself enough to drive any passenger mad!

Something is weirding me out about this place.. But I can't put my finger on what?

Welcome to Your Turn to Disembark, a episodic narrative adventure game about finding your way out of this strange and unnerving train with the help of 8 other bizarre passengers.

In this mystery adventure game you will be talking to the various passengers who are also stuck upon this train and trying to escape together.
Learn about their pasts and futures, their struggles and their strengths.
Some will become your friends, some may snap...

Walk around the train to try and discover it's secrets!
And maybe, finally figure out what really is going on in this locomotive...
